title: TOWIE's Chloe Sims and Dan Edgar come face to face for the first time since Dan dumped her
text:
Chloe Sims and Dan Edgar came face to face for the first time since their falling out earlier this year after Dan dumped Chloe to reunite with his ex Amber Turner.

The TOWIE stars hooked up in Thailand and then had a brief fling but Chloe, 36, was left hurt when Dan, 29, ended up going back to Amber, 26.

On Sunday night's episode, viewers watched as the pair finally let their feelings be known as they came face to face at a Halloween party.

Drama: Chloe Sims and Dan Edgar came face to face for the first time since their falling out earlier this year after Dan dumped Chloe to reunite with his ex Amber Turner

Dan began by saying: 'I've spoke to Amber about this and said to her like...'

Chloe interrupted and said: 'How did she feel about it?'

'It is still raw for Amber, Dan said before Chloe interrupted again, 'I do sympathise with the girl, I do and I don't want to make her feel uncomfortable.'

Dan continued: 'I do think this whole thing is still hanging over everyone. I don't want to bring everything up from before but I am sorry for how things went.'

Truth: On Sunday night's episode, viewers watched as the pair finally let their feelings be known as they came face to face at a Halloween party

Chloe said: 'I appreciate the apology but what do you want to happen? When we see each other, do we say hello now?'

Dan said he didn't see any reason why he and Chloe should not say hello to each other but he had to be respectful towards Amber and wasn't making excuses for himself.

'I don't need you to stand there and put yourself down Dan,' Chloe said.

Honest: Dan said he didn't see any reason why he and Chloe should not say hello to each other but he had to be respectful towards Amber and wasn't making excuses for himself

'You've apologised and that's great but it's still a bit weird. It's still like we've got to tip-toe around. Do you want to be friends or not?'

'I don't know how to make it normal, it's such a weird situation,' Dan replied.

'When I'm with Amber I've got to be mindful of her feelings. If I was standing next to you having a laugh and a joke, it would upset her.'

Chloe said: 'You've apologised and that's great but it's still a bit weird. It's still like we've got to tip-toe around. Do you want to be friends or not?'

'So what are you doing here then? I just feel like you and Amber have belittled me so much and made out that I was so insignificant and I wasn't.'

Dan then said: 'I know that, after it was done I almost like tried to hide away.'

Determined to make her feelings known, Chloe replied: 'No after it was done you just pushed me to a side, kicked me to the curb and then just lived your best life.'

Reaction: Viewers made their opinions known on the exchange between Chloe and Dan on social media

Viewers took to social media to express their views on the moment with one writing: 'Chloe 100% still in love with Dan at the end' while another said: 'Respect to Chloe for the way she stayed calm and classy when talking to Dan'.

Another speculated Dan's girlfriend Amber would not be impressed by the conversation, writing: 'Amber must be seething with Dan speaking to Chloe'.

The Only Way Is Essex airs next Sunday at 9pm on ITVBe.
